title: What can I do if I can't receive or send messages?
answer:
l   Your phone reception may be poor. Take your phone to a place with good reception and try again.

l   Your phone power may be low. Charge your phone until it has a reasonable amount of power before trying again.

l   Your may be experiencing a network rush. Wait for a while and try again.

l   Make sure the recipient's phone number is correct.

l   Multimedia messages cannot be sent or received if your data service is disabled. Make sure your data service is enabled.

l   Attachments larger than 300 KB can't be sent through multimedia message. Try splitting your attachment into multiple multimedia messages or sending it in other ways.
